package com.example.danabala.data.local.entity
import androidx.room.Entity import androidx.room.PrimaryKey import com.example.danabala.domain.model.ExerciseResult
@Entity(tableName = "exercise_results") data class ExerciseResultEntity( @PrimaryKey(autoGenerate = true) val id: Long = 0, val exerciseId: String, val userId: String, val score: Int, val maxScore: Int, val timeSpentSeconds: Int, val completedAt: Long, val mistakes: String // JSON строка для хранения списка ошибок )
fun ExerciseResultEntity.toDomain(): ExerciseResult = ExerciseResult( exerciseId = exerciseId, userId = userId, score = score, maxScore = maxScore, timeSpentSeconds = timeSpentSeconds, completedAt = completedAt, mistakes = mistakes.split(",").filter { it.isNotBlank() } )
fun ExerciseResult.toEntity(): ExerciseResultEntity = ExerciseResultEntity( exerciseId = exerciseId, userId = userId, score = score, maxScore = maxScore, timeSpentSeconds = timeSpentSeconds, completedAt = completedAt, mistakes = mistakes.joinToString(",") )

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?> <LinearLayout xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android" xmlns:app="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res-auto" xmlns:tools="http://schemas.android.com/tools" android:id="@+id/main" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="match_parent" android:orientation="vertical" android:background="@drawable/gradient_exercise_background" android:padding="16dp" tools:context=".LetterRecognitionActivity">
<!-- Верхняя панель с кнопкой назад, заголовком и прогресс-баром --> <LinearLayout android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:orientation="horizontal" android:gravity="center_vertical" android:layout_marginBottom="20dp">
<!-- Кнопка назад --> <ImageView android:id="@+id/backButton" android:layout_width="32dp" android:layout_height="32dp" android:src="@drawable/ic_arrow_back" android:background="?attr/selectableItemBackgroundBorderless" android:padding="4dp" android:clickable="true" android:focusable="true" android:contentDescription="Назад" />
<!-- Заголовок --> <TextView android:layout_width="0dp" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_weight="1" android:text=" Найди букву" android:textSize="20sp" android:textStyle="bold" android:textColor="#8E24AA" android:layout_marginStart="12dp" android:gravity="start" />
</LinearLayout>
<!-- Прогресс-бар --> <ProgressBar android:id="@+id/progressBar" style="?android:attr/progressBarStyleHorizontal" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="8dp" android:layout_marginBottom="30dp" android:max="100" android:progress="3" android:progressTint="#9C27B0" android:progressBackgroundTint="#E0E0E0" />
<!-- Красивая кнопка озвучивания --> <androidx.cardview.widget.CardView android:layout_width="80dp" android:layout_height="80dp" android:layout_gravity="center" android:layout_marginBottom="40dp" app:cardCornerRadius="40dp" app:cardElevation="12dp" app:cardBackgroundColor="#8E24AA">
<ImageView android:id="@+id/speakerButton" android:layout_width="48dp" android:layout_height="48dp" android:layout_gravity="center" android:src="@drawable/ic_volume_up" android:background="?attr/selectableItemBackgroundBorderless" android:clickable="true" android:focusable="true" android:contentDescription="Озвучить вопрос" android:tint="#FFFFFF" android:scaleType="centerInside" />
</androidx.cardview.widget.CardView>
<!-- Сетка карточек с буквами (2x2) --> <LinearLayout android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="0dp" android:layout_weight="1" android:orientation="vertical" android:gravity="center">
<!-- Первый ряд --> <LinearLayout android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:orientation="horizontal" android:gravity="center" android:layout_marginBottom="20dp">
<!-- Карточка 1 --> <androidx.cardview.widget.CardView android:id="@+id/card1" android:layout_width="120dp" android:layout_height="120dp" android:layout_margin="12dp" android:clickable="true" android:focusable="true" android:foreground="?android:attr/selectableItemBackground" app:cardCornerRadius="20dp" app:cardElevation="8dp" app:cardBackgroundColor="#FFFFFF">
<TextView android:id="@+id/letter1" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="match_parent" android:text="А" android:textSize="48sp" android:textStyle="bold" android:textColor="#8E24AA" android:gravity="center" />
</androidx.cardview.widget.CardView>
<!-- Карточка 2 --> <androidx.cardview.widget.CardView android:id="@+id/card2" android:layout_width="120dp" android:layout_height="120dp" android:layout_margin="12dp" android:clickable="true" android:focusable="true" android:foreground="?android:attr/selectableItemBackground" app:cardCornerRadius="20dp" app:cardElevation="8dp" app:cardBackgroundColor="#FFFFFF">
<TextView android:id="@+id/letter2" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="match_parent" android:text="Б" android:textSize="48sp" android:textStyle="bold" android:textColor="#8E24AA" android:gravity="center" />
</androidx.cardview.widget.CardView>
</LinearLayout>
<!-- Второй ряд --> <LinearLayout android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:orientation="horizontal" android:gravity="center">
<!-- Карточка 3 --> <androidx.cardview.widget.CardView android:id="@+id/card3" android:layout_width="120dp" android:layout_height="120dp" android:layout_margin="12dp" android:clickable="true" android:focusable="true" android:foreground="?android:attr/selectableItemBackground" app:cardCornerRadius="20dp" app:cardElevation="8dp" app:cardBackgroundColor="#FFFFFF">
<TextView android:id="@+id/letter3" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="match_parent" android:text="В" android:textSize="48sp" android:textStyle="bold" android:textColor="#8E24AA" android:gravity="center" />
</androidx.cardview.widget.CardView>
<!-- Карточка 4 --> <androidx.cardview.widget.CardView android:id="@+id/card4" android:layout_width="120dp" android:layout_height="120dp" android:layout_margin="12dp" android:clickable="true" android:focusable="true" android:foreground="?android:attr/selectableItemBackground" app:cardCornerRadius="20dp" app:cardElevation="8dp" app:cardBackgroundColor="#FFFFFF">
<TextView android:id="@+id/letter4" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="match_parent" android:text="Г" android:textSize="48sp" android:textStyle="bold" android:textColor="#8E24AA" android:gravity="center" />
</androidx.cardview.widget.CardView>
</LinearLayout>
</LinearLayout>
</LinearLayout>

ь<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?> <ScrollView xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android" xmlns:app="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res-auto" xmlns:tools="http://schemas.android.com/tools" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="match_parent" android:background="@drawable/child_gradient_blue">
<LinearLayout android:id="@+id/main" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:orientation="vertical" android:padding="16dp" tools:context=".MathExercisesActivity">

<!-- Вкладки: Тренировки / Игры --> <com.google.android.material.card.MaterialCardView android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginBottom="16dp" app:cardCornerRadius="20dp" app:cardUseCompatPadding="true" app:cardElevation="4dp" app:strokeWidth="0dp" app:cardBackgroundColor="#FFFFFFFF" app:contentPadding="8dp">

<!-- Контейнер: Тренировки (по умолчанию видим) --> <LinearLayout android:id="@+id/trainingsContainer" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:orientation="vertical">
<!-- Список упражнений (кроме игр) -->
<!-- Знакомство с цифрами --> <androidx.cardview.widget.CardView android:id="@+id/cardNumberIntroduction" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="80dp" android:layout_margin="8dp" android:clickable="true" android:focusable="true" android:foreground="?android:attr/selectableItemBackground" app:cardCornerRadius="16dp" app:cardElevation="6dp" app:cardBackgroundColor="#E1F5FE">
<LinearLayout android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="match_parent" android:orientation="horizontal" android:gravity="center_vertical" android:padding="16dp">
<TextView android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="" android:textSize="32sp" android:layout_marginEnd="16dp" />
<LinearLayout android:layout_width="0dp" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_weight="1" android:orientation="vertical">
<TextView android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="Знакомство с цифрами" android:textSize="18sp" android:textStyle="bold" android:textColor="#0277BD" />
<TextView android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="Первое знакомство с цифрами" android:textSize="14sp" android:textColor="#666666" android:layout_marginTop="2dp" />
</LinearLayout>
</LinearLayout>
</androidx.cardview.widget.CardView>
<!-- Найди цифру --> <androidx.cardview.widget.CardView android:id="@+id/cardNumbers" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="80dp" android:layout_margin="8dp" android:clickable="true" android:focusable="true" android:foreground="?android:attr/selectableItemBackground" app:cardCornerRadius="16dp" app:cardElevation="6dp" app:cardBackgroundColor="#E8F5E8">
<LinearLayout android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="match_parent" android:orientation="horizontal" android:gravity="center_vertical" android:padding="16dp">
<TextView android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="" android:textSize="32sp" android:layout_marginEnd="16dp" />
<LinearLayout android:layout_width="0dp" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_weight="1" android:orientation="vertical">
<TextView android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="Найди цифру" android:textSize="18sp" android:textStyle="bold" android:textColor="#2E7D32" />
<TextView android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="Распознавание цифр" android:textSize="14sp" android:textColor="#666666" android:layout_marginTop="2dp" />
</LinearLayout>
</LinearLayout>
</androidx.cardview.widget.CardView>
<!-- Найди количество --> <androidx.cardview.widget.CardView android:id="@+id/cardCounting" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="80dp" android:layout_margin="8dp" android:clickable="true" android:focusable="true" android:foreground="?android:attr/selectableItemBackground" app:cardCornerRadius="16dp" app:cardElevation="6dp" app:cardBackgroundColor="#F3E5F5">
<LinearLayout android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="match_parent" android:orientation="horizontal" android:gravity="center_vertical" android:padding="16dp">
<TextView android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="" android:textSize="32sp" android:layout_marginEnd="16dp" />
<LinearLayout android:layout_width="0dp" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_weight="1" android:orientation="vertical">
<TextView android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="Найди количество" android:textSize="18sp" android:textStyle="bold" android:textColor="#7B1FA2" />
<TextView android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="Счёт предметов" android:textSize="14sp" android:textColor="#666666" android:layout_marginTop="2dp" />
</LinearLayout>
</LinearLayout>
</androidx.cardview.widget.CardView>
<!-- Посчитай предметы --> <androidx.cardview.widget.CardView android:id="@+id/cardObjectCounting" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="80dp" android:layout_margin="8dp" android:clickable="true" android:focusable="true" android:foreground="?android:attr/selectableItemBackground" app:cardCornerRadius="16dp" app:cardElevation="6dp" app:cardBackgroundColor="#FFF3E0">
<LinearLayout android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="match_parent" android:orientation="horizontal" android:gravity="center_vertical" android:padding="16dp">
<TextView android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="" android:textSize="32sp" android:layout_marginEnd="16dp" />
<LinearLayout android:layout_width="0dp" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_weight="1" android:orientation="vertical">
<TextView android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="Посчитай предметы" android:textSize="18sp" android:textStyle="bold" android:textColor="#E65100" />

</androidx.cardview.widget.CardView>
